# Usage

Generate 10 string, each 7 characters long  
`randhs --seed 0 --count 5 string -n 7 abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz`
```
nxwlyiy
hjuzxzi
stuhyqo
ktmubnv
ycwmrye
```

Generate 512 bits prime number  
`randhs prime -k 512`
```
13171398778144614684332480923776107925626769234409388363696999823999080029559758477703798062194771091255877008587779632181368388606473215953640306558356723
```
Generate ten 256 bits prime numbers in hex format  
`randhs --count 10 prime -k 256 -h`
```
be0026537b49088adba139ab29eabbc09aefe34a89c3d2eb6f9f86ed8501e525
d5281424b4a4539363d9c2f4f0bc6eddb465be4c1eb9f9fd9883139537b0f835
f4f28be7ed8d7664be316ec7b5f7cf7163b263adc9a94a774706dcda6519d755
a9bf624e9007763a758230fab8a8ba7da79dfc8cc1e67b9952a98374d590b9ad
a70bb4da25fcc62395fdd6354709c357e5aade85e277c30fb9972470cc2b3b55
cd6e69bf3aff12dc8e1b229664f7d897a8a39c66411807aff63b228510d3d6f5
bfe8ae3883c22ee4a1111ec6105bfa159eeab6191bbfcd3adda47d88e1405df7
d96be53c1799adfd867e85d1b25b058844b97c6002bf89dcaad2b77c908e3977
c0067785a86620bf579777b94c6daeefc17f2da56bfdaf78ca3709f3b59ca4df
9c50e58f5d610425ab7d961d06818e261a79afeb046f47ee9abc313ee84f02b7
```
